text:
predictive modeling problem. Classiﬁcation predictive modeling problems are those where a
category is predicted. A category is a label from a small well-deﬁned set of labels; for example
hot, cold, up, down, and buy, sell are categories. A time series forecasting problem in which
you want to classify input time series data is a classiﬁcation type predictive modeling problem.
 Regression: Forecast a numerical quantity.
 Classiﬁcation: Classify as one of two or more labels.
